children.text: hook is designed to manage state operations for tables or similar data structures such as lists, data grids, etc.
This hook provides the following functionality:
Handle changing of filtration, sorting, list range, filters and columns configs, selected preset and view state.
Storing state in the URL and syncing it with React state, or storing it in local state.
Normalizing state by clearing empty and invalid values.
Please note that despite the hook's name suggesting its usage with tables, it is not limited to tables and can be used with any data representation that requires its functionality.
All the table-specific parameters are optional and can be omitted.
